sentence.Network_en: The family had given shelter to an old pedlar.
sentence.Network_cn: 这家人为一个老年货郎提供住宿.

sentence.Network_en: The pedlar sponged money off us.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个小商贩骗了我们的钱.

sentence.Network_en: I buy to that book from flowing pedlar there.
sentence.Network_cn: 我从流动小贩那里买到了那本书.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: perhaps an alteration of synonymous dialect pedder, apparently from dialect ped 'pannier'

means.word_mean: 1. someone who travels about selling his wares (as on the streets or at carnivals)
